column1: According  to  the  17th  Amendment  to  the  Constitution,  only  the  pending
matters  pertaining  to  the  appointment,  promotion,  disciplinary  control  and
dismissal  of  any  police  officer  before  the  Public  Service  Commission  on  or
before 03.10.2001, shall stand removed to the National Police Commission,
and such matters to be continued and completed before the NPC.
